title: Getting slow download speeds
body:
So my internet is good, i have no viruses and my firewall isn't blocking the LoL launcher but i am trying to update to 5.6 but i am getting kbps even though when i did a Ookla speed test on my internet it was 5 Mbps. So how can i fix this?  Also, is update 5.6 really around 1000 MB because that's what s says on the Launcher.

EDIT: I restarted the launcher and i managed to finish downloading it but now it is stuck on 33% and scanning files so far 1400 files scanned :/

EDIT 2: nvm edit 1 the launcher reached 34% and has 35 MB to download at 40 kbps :(

replies.body:
Ensure that you're on the Windows 8 Start Screen.
Simply type cmd and the Windows search bar will appear on the right hand side with search results.
Right click on Command Prompt and click Run as administrator.
Type in the command ipconfig /flushdns


Dunno if this will work, worth a try?
